name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Google Classroom
description: This is a repository of google classroom APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Google Classroom
apis.description: Google Classroom is mission control for your classes. As a free service for teachers and students, you can create classes, distribute assignments, send feedback, and see everything in one place. Instant. Paperless. Easy.
